title: High Court Won't Reinstate $5.7 Billion Card Settlement (Audio)
itunes:title: High Court Won't Reinstate $5.7 Billion Card Settlement (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Jennifer Rie, a senior litigation analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses why the Supreme Court refused to revive at $5.7 billion settlement over retailer claims that Visa and Mastercard improperly fixed credit-card sqipe fees. She speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
